translation.src_text: Tibway sala toujou ni échofi paski i pa ka lavé pyé’y
translation.tgt_text: That boy always has athlete’s foot because he doesn’t wash his feet

translation.src_text: Dòktè zannimo-a di pou mété gwo siwo an manjé bèf
translation.tgt_text: The vet said to put molasses in the cow’s food

translation.src_text: I délasé soulyé’y
translation.tgt_text: He unlaced his shoes

translation.src_text: Sé péchè-a ka sennen
translation.tgt_text: The fishermen are seining

translation.src_text: Nou pa méwité kado sala
translation.tgt_text: We didn’t deserve that gift

translation.src_text: Wasin pyé awali-a mawé oliwon pyé pòwyé-a
translation.tgt_text: The root of the awali tree is tied around the white  cedar tree

translation.src_text: I alé an pwévit
translation.tgt_text: He went to the bathroom

translation.src_text: Mwen vlé on bwanch fil pou koud tjilòt mwen
translation.tgt_text: I want a piece of thread to sew my pants

translation.src_text: Patjit-la vid; i pa sanm i ja vann anyen bonmaten-an
translation.tgt_text: The money bag is empty; it doesn’t seem she has sold anything this morning

translation.src_text: Nonm malad-la mawé patjé’y
translation.tgt_text: The sick man died

translation.src_text: Vè-a plen dlo
translation.tgt_text: The glass is full of water

translation.src_text: Bèf sala sovay tèlman ou pa sa menm vini pwé’y
translation.tgt_text: That cow is so wild you cannot even come near it

translation.src_text: Pa bat zòy anlè topi mwen avan ou gòbé’y
translation.tgt_text: Don’t hit my top or you’ll chip it

translation.src_text: Yo ka konté lajan-an
translation.tgt_text: They’re counting the money

translation.src_text: Pa kwazé chivé mwen
translation.tgt_text: Don’t mess up my hair

translation.src_text: Yo ka vann li on dòla pa boutèy
translation.tgt_text: They sell it one dollar per bottle

translation.src_text: Mwen vlé nonm sala mennajé zafè mwen byen èk pa gaspiyé lajan
translation.tgt_text: I want that man to manage my affairs well and not waste money

translation.src_text: Yo tjwé bouk-la èk yo fè fèt
translation.tgt_text: They killed the billy goat and they had a feast

translation.src_text: Annou chanjé pozisyon nou
translation.tgt_text: Let’s change our position

translation.src_text: Mwen ni pou achté lanti pou mwen sa bouwi épi diwi
translation.tgt_text: I need to buy some le ntils to cook with rice

translation.src_text: Nou tjouwi dé gwap koko
translation.tgt_text: We picked two bunches of coconuts

translation.src_text: Nou avòtsèvis pou’w
translation.tgt_text: We are at your service

translation.src_text: Yo ka pawsadé kay-la
translation.tgt_text: They’re wattling the house

translation.src_text: Balenn-an échwé asou lans lanmè Labowi-a
translation.tgt_text: The whale washed up on the Laborie beach

translation.src_text: An ti madanm maléwèz ki ban mwen an pòt dlo pou mwen bwè
translation.tgt_text: It was a little poor woman who gave me a cup of water to drink

translation.src_text: Nonm sala èk madanm li byen jwenn
translation.tgt_text: That man and his wife are well-matched

translation.src_text: Yo ka klouwé planch-lan épi an mato
translation.tgt_text: They’re nailing the board with a hammer

translation.src_text: Ou pa ni asé pyéton pou pasé asou bwa-a
translation.tgt_text: You don’t have good enough balance to walk on the wood

translation.src_text: Wimèd-la anmè kon fyèl
translation.tgt_text: That medicine is bitter like bile

translation.src_text: I ka twavay wèd toulé jou san pozé
translation.tgt_text: I works hard every day without resting

translation.src_text: Mwen té pè tèlman mwen twanblé kon on fèy
translation.tgt_text: I was so afraid I shook like a leaf

translation.src_text: Mwen sé pa on bata, mwen sé léjitim li
translation.tgt_text: I’m not a bastard; I’m his legitimate child

translation.src_text: Sa sé on kay pawsad
translation.tgt_text: That’s a wattle house

translation.src_text: Lè i wè sa, i désann vitman
translation.tgt_text: When he saw that, he went down quickly

translation.src_text: Ou kay an djèwté lè gason’w-lan vini sòti lòt péyi
translation.tgt_text: You’ll be joyful when your son comes back from overseas

translation.src_text: Chyen ka kouwi dèyè chat
translation.tgt_text: Dogs chase cats

translation.src_text: Yo kay sipwi’y épi an kado
translation.tgt_text: They’ll surprise him with a gift
